page.title: 09HEALTH CENTRE IN OAKLEY AREA
page.content: The Health Centre in Oakley is used by the people of Oakley,Blairhall and Comrie.It includes{doctors,dentists, {chiropodists,nurses and health visit- {ors.}The chiropodist works here 3 days a week.He also makes home calls.The main foot complaints are{corns and {callouses}suffered mostly by senior citizens. The dentist's working day is 09:00- 16:00.He also visits the local school once a year.{Children are his {main patients}suffering from tooth decay due to eating too many sweets and irregular brushing. There are{5 doctors}in this centre. They consult from 08:30-10:00 and 15:30-17:30 bar Thursdays.They are also on call for home visiting. The most common complaint is the cold. It is a very busy surgery with a{baby {clinic,well-woman clinic and a nurse available for emergency calls.
